name: Scopa (itch)
description:
This is a small remake of the italian card game scopa. 

Planning on making it multiplayer in the future and adding AI. Right now you play as both player and cand see each others cards.

How to play: Every player starts with three cards in their hand. Your goal is to get as many cards as possible. To get a card you have to either match your card number with the card in the table or the sum of two or more cards in the table have to match you card number.

When you get the last card in the table you do a Scopa and receive an extra point.

At the end of the round you receive points for: Most cards. Most number of heart cards, most number of 7s and a point per Scopa.

First to 11 points wins.

--Credits: Assets by KenneyNL
